name: dbmux
description: A flexible database management CLI tool with persistent configuration

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.build:binary: mkdir -p binaries && bun build src/index.ts --compile --outfile binaries/dbmux
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p binaries && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile binaries/dbmux-linux-x64
scripts.build:macos-intel: mkdir -p binaries && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile binaries/dbmux-darwin-x64
scripts.build:macos-arm: mkdir -p binaries && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile binaries/dbmux-darwin-arm64
scripts.build:windows: mkdir -p binaries && bun build src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile binaries/dbmux-windows-x64.exe
scripts.build:binaries: bun run build:linux && bun run build:macos-intel && bun run build:macos-arm && bun run build:windows

author: Bhagya Mudgal <bhagyamudgal@gmail.com>
